title: Zozibini Tunzi's profile added to the Miss Universe website, and her headshot steals the spotlight
text:
Zozibini Tunzi's profile added to the Miss Universe website, and her headshot steals the spotlight share this

Cape Town -Miss South Africa Zozibini Tunzi's profile has been uploaded to the Miss Universe website, and her headshot is striking.

"My bio has been uploaded on the Miss Universe website, and it really hit me that this is actually happening," Zozibini wrote on Instagram, sharing the beautiful photo on Instagram. Here's how Miss Universe will be chosen

Channel24 Pageant has you covered with all the dates, locations as well as the South African representatives for all major pageants.

Zozibini chose a bold colour for the garment and headdress she wears for her official portrait. (See all the contestants here)

She is the only contestant to cover her hair for the official headshot, which makes the public relations graduate stand out even more!

TAKE A LOOK HERE:

The 26-year-old also thanked her followers and fans for their support, saying: "We are taking South Africa to the universe, and I couldn't be more proud and excited."

According to reports, the 2019 Miss Universe pageant will take place on 8 December in the United States.

On the night of the pageant, Catriona Gray will hand over her title to her successor with a brand-new crown that will be unveiled at the competition.
description: Miss South Africa Zozibini Tunzi's profile has been uploaded to the Miss Universe website, and her headshot is striking.
